mapper.update: update douban_subject set download_times = ifnull(download_times, 0) + 1 where id = (select subject_id from subtitle where id = #{subtitleId})
mapper.select: ( SELECT id, title, img_id, rating FROM douban_subject WHERE ratings_count > 1000 AND subtype = 'movie' ORDER BY download_times desc, rating DESC LIMIT 16 ) union all ( SELECT id, title, img_id, rating FROM douban_subject WHERE ratings_count > 1000 AND subtype = 'tv' ORDER BY download_times desc, rating DESC LIMIT 8 )
